amendment.description: An amendment numbered 47 printed in Part A of House Report 118-602 to reduce funding for the Denali Regional Commission to FY19 levels and transfer the difference to the spending reduction account.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to reduce the account for the Denali Commission by $2 million and apply the savings to the Spending Reduction Account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Perry amendment (A023) Failed by recorded vote: 134 - 283 (Roll no. 369).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Perry amendment (A023) Failed by recorded vote: 134 - 283 (Roll no. 369).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
